abstract: Canadian Prime Min Justin Trudeau pushes forward with plan to implement national carbon pricing plans in all provinces; move comes despite fact that Pres-elect Donald Trump's skepticism about climate change has many worried that Canada will be at odds with United States in moving ahead with carbon pricing.

keywords.value: Carbon Caps and Emissions Trading Programs
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Donald J. Trump’s stance on climate change has ignited a debate over a plan by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau to reduce carbon emissions by putting a price on them.
snippet: Donald J. Trump’s stance on climate change has ignited a debate over a plan by Prime Minister Justin Trudeau to reduce carbon emissions by putting a price on them....

headline.main: Canada Wonders, if U.S. Balks, Is Carbon Pricing Still the Answer?
headline.print_headline: Eye on Trump, Canada Debates Carbon Pricing
